sentence.Network_en: Atharvaveda means the Veda of the Wise and the Old.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿达婆吠陀意思是明智和古老的吠陀.

sentence.Network_en: Veda is acclaimed as the oldest extant literature available to humans.
sentence.Network_cn: 梨俱吠陀》作为对人类有用的现存最古老文献而被称赞.

sentence.Network_en: A hymn is also dedicated to him alone in Rig Veda.
sentence.Network_cn: 利俱吠陀也有一首独一无二献身于他的诗.

means.word_mean: 1. a collection of sacrificial formulas and prayers

auth_sentence.content: The " Veda " surmises that our ethereal body is everlasting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The " Veda " surmises that our ethereal body is everlasting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The " Veda " surmises that our ethereal body is everlasting.

auth_sentence.content: Sama-Veda Samhita consists of chants and tunes for singing at the sacrifices.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sama-Veda Samhita consists of chants and tunes for singing at the sacrifices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sama-Veda Samhita consists of chants and tunes for singing at the sacrifices.

auth_sentence.content: Yajur-Veda Samhita is used as a handbook by priests performing the vedic sacrifices.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yajur-Veda Samhita is used as a handbook by priests performing the vedic sacrifices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yajur-Veda Samhita is used as a handbook by priests performing the vedic sacrifices.
